pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### Installation smsactivate```shpip install smsactivate```## Requires - requests- json### Connection```pythonfrom smsactivate.api import SMSActivateAPIsa = SMSActivateAPI(APIKEY)sa.debug_mode = True # Optional action. Required for debugging```Description of the functionality of smsactivate is indicated on the [SMSActivate API](https://sms-activate.org/api2)
